item.title: Distance...
item.description: Week 1: Yellow Lines. This art was lovingly created using: : Traditional (fine liner, artist pitt pen, paper). Artist’s Notes Distancing concept from the WiFi Symbol applied to current situation Social Media N/A. Other Edit this page on GitHub . Create a bug ticket for the developer. Parsed source from Discord is as follows: Week : 1 Title : Distance... Medium : Traditional (fine liner, artist pitt pen, paper) Description : Distancing concept from the WiFi Symbol applied to current situation
